name: Rebecca Kacherginsky
description: Rebecca Kacherginsky is a payments and crypto design expert with over a decade of experience at Coinbase, Facebook, PayPal, and Intuit. She has developed intuitive payments products, driving billions in savings and new revenue. Recently, she led design at Coinbase Commerce and is now a DeFi design consultant. In "Bootstrap Your dApp UX," Rebecca shares best practices to help developers create exceptional user experiences and drive Web3 adoption.
